Name: TOC Homebrewery
TOC Display
Template:
Based on the campaign concept provided below, generate a user-friendly Table of Contents for on-screen display.
For each suggested section title, also determine its most appropriate type from the following list:
[monster, character, npc, location, item, quest, chapter, note, world_detail, generic].

Output each top-level section as a bullet point starting with '- '.
The format for each line should be: `- {{Generated Section Title}} [Type: {{SuggestedType}}]`
For example:
- The Whispering Caves [Type: location]
- Rescuing the Artifact [Type: quest]
  - The Guardian Golem [Type: monster]
  - The Hidden Lever [Type: item]
- Elara, the Wise Sage [Type: npc]

Focus on clear section titles. Subsections can be nested with indentation if appropriate, following the same format.

Campaign Concept:
{campaign_concept}

Name: Campaign Names
Template: Based on the campaign concept: {campaign_concept}, generate {count} alternative, catchy campaign titles. Use sensory language and hyperbole and metaphor. List each title on a new line.

Name: Generate NPC Details
Template: Flesh out the details for an NPC named {npc_name} including their motivations, appearance, and potential plot hooks. Consider the overall {campaign_concept} and existing characters: {campaign_characters}. You can also use {existing_sections_summary} for context.

Name: Describe Location
Template: Provide a vivid description of {location_name}. What does it look like, sound like, smell like? What is its atmosphere? Consider the {campaign_concept}.

Name: Create Quest Outline
Template: Outline a quest titled '{quest_title}' that fits within the {campaign_concept}. Detail the main objectives, key NPCs involved ({campaign_characters}), and potential rewards.
